pageContext.claim: The Paris Accord "includes yet another scheme to redistribute wealth out of the United States through the so-called Green Climate Fund -- nice name -- which calls for developed countries to send $100 billion to developing countries all on top of America’s existing and massive foreign aid payments.”
pageContext.analysis: Forty-three countries, including nine developing countries, have pledged to contribute $10.13 billion to the Green Climate Fund, not $100 billion.
